poem:
"Daybreak Song for Chris Parr"

In the twilight of the theatre, Chris danced,
Guiding pens to stage, lending voice to silence.
Shadows shift in Parkinson's harsh melody –
Yet, in script apostles branched, a legacy blooms,
Under a flickering spotlight, forever ignited. 

Remember him a dawn-bringer - 
a breath-giver to whispers,
A painter of dreams on the canvas of cathode ray,
Casting shadows into light.
